html:
4.5.20  7:03 pm   When is a new video coming  out?

     i'm having a countdown timer

4.5.20  7:01 pm   why did you make this website 

      so i don't have to keep emailing the content to everyone individually

4.5.20  6:52 pm   What are your thoughts on plastic?

     it's like a protective wall that prevents biology from interacting with itself

4.5.20  6:52 pm   Are you making multiple videos and just going to release one every 3 or so months so you have time to make more before all your videos run out?

     no, it turns out that strategy is no good. because, in order for the video releases to continue at the same pace after that 3 month period, you would need to actually make them at the exact pace they are being released anyway. which defeats the purpose of that strategy

4.5.20  6:35 pm   thoughts on pants?

     seems to be some sort of leg jacket

4.5.20  6:22 pm   I recently found out about your website and I wanna know when will you post another song they fire

     i'm having a countdown timer

4.5.20  6:11 pm   would you like it if we all got la de da de da de da de day oh to 10 million views on youtube before may?

     that would be convenient

4.5.20  6:09 pm   Bill, I miss watching your vids and listening to your songs. Is it possible for me to experience something like this again? 

     yes, go ahead and go to my website, youtube channel, spotify channel, etc

4.5.20  5:54 pm   What do you think of bananas?

     good way to point at something. best fruit for pointing

4.5.20  5:10 pm   why are some songs sad

     to make you appreciate happiness even more

4.5.20  4:29 pm   how do thing?

     the scientific community is offering a massive prize reward to anyone who can figure it out

4.5.20  4:24 pm   I got it. Your music is like if Stevie Wonder and James Taylor had a really sexy baby. 

     i've just received word that they are pregnant with some more babies

4.5.20  4:03 pm   If you had a T-shirt on with one of your song lyrics printed on it, which one would it be?

     &

4.5.20  3:44 pm   What questions does George Clooney answer?

     maybe questions like this

4.5.20  3:43 pm   how can i stop wasting time

     you must first understand how you wish to use the time

4.5.20  3:35 pm   what's the best way to make a paper plane?

     learn from John Collins, the paper airplane guy

4.5.20  3:33 pm   When will Mount St.Helens blow up again?

     likely, at some point

4.5.20  3:32 pm   do u eat babies

     no

4.5.20  3:27 pm   Not a question, just here to say I hope you're doing well, because your songs have me doing pretty well, at least today

     you'll never believe this but i'm going to make more

4.5.20  3:18 pm   This isn't a question In just want to tell you that I love you and I'm listening to your music all the time now

     you'll never believe this but i'm going to make more

4.5.20  2:41 pm   do you enjoy what are you doing?

     i am terrified but yes

4.5.20  2:32 pm   would you ever make a video about science, engineering, technology, and/or coherent topics?

     that sounds like something i would do

4.5.20  2:03 pm   how do you tie your shoes? do you tie every shoe the same? do you make a bow?

     victory is to find shoes that are tight enough to stay on, while still being loose enough to slip on, entirely hands free

     i want a video actually. and what did you do today? 

     not tie my shoes, that's for sure. i actually didn't even put on my shoes, but that's another story

4.5.20  1:50 pm   What is your opinion on penguins?

     they have knees, that's all i know. sometimes my mind just runs wild with wondering the exact number of knees they could have

4.5.20  1:29 pm   How do you feel about puns?

     they're grate

      The lowest form of comedy? Or something else. Can you teach me any good ones? 

     'but'

4.5.20  1:27 pm   I would like to say that I listen to 'I did a bad thing' a lot and I always skip to the part where you say bong bong bay-oh because it is very nice

     it might actually be you, who is nice

     
Ok bye

4.5.20  1:17 pm   if a prosecutor is the defendant, can he take his own case and prosecute in his own trial?

     for the right price

4.5.20  12:55 pm   Are you a fish?

     no

4.5.20  12:27 pm   Greetings Bill, big fan of your work!
You've mentioned several times from 2019 to now wanting to do a "talk show". Would the show be audio only- (i don't expect it to be since you've expressed how important combining audio with visual content together is for you) -or will there be video visuals too? If there is video for the talk show, will it be a video of you on a set or stage of some sort hosting the talk show?

     *hannah montana voice* "best of both worlds"

4.5.20  12:27 pm   can humans do photosynthesis

     i was going to say no but now that i think about it yes

4.5.20  12:15 pm   How do i get smart???

     if you get stupid enough it loops around

4.5.20  12:14 pm   Does socks taste good?

     no

     (Asking for a friend)

4.5.20  12:10 pm   What do u think about

     time and space

4.5.20  11:57 am   Are you actually a human

     oh that would explain a lot

4.5.20  11:49 am   Say the government collapses and corporations are in a war of supremacy: who do you support on the path to domination?

     apple

4.5.20  11:47 am   why I'm such a lame ass

     you might be the chosen one

4.5.20  11:46 am   What's your take on Owl City's "Fireflies"?

     when he says 'just a crack', it overwhelms me

4.5.20  11:44 am   yo not a question but just a reminder to drink some water. it's a good idea, take care of yourself dude
also i've been taking a lot of inspiration from you, i finally have gotten to a stage of even beginning to organize the mountains of my creations and already have a schedule in mind and all that crap i need to start doing what i need to do... thanks for having to figure it all out first so i didn't have to!

     wait til you see what i'm trying to figure out now

4.5.20  11:34 am   Thank you for taking the time to make your new content even better, hard to imagine how good it can get considering how much I love it now, but I trust you because you're my favorite artistic mind of my generation. Of your new approaches that are being developed, which one are you looking the most forward to at this very moment?

     LENGTH OF VIDEO PRODUCTION TIME ACTUALLY BEING SOMEWHERE NEAR COMMENSURATE WITH THE RATE AT WHICH I CAN HAVE IDEAS FOR THEM

4.5.20  11:24 am   You r the best musician ever

     holy flagpole you are very friendly

4.5.20  11:11 am   i keep getting melodies and lyrics in my head and i even sing it then when i try to record it down i suddenly forget what i was just singing about. how do i solve this?

     you're gonna have to get quicker with that record button. maybe wear it around your wrist? keep it close by

4.5.20  11:06 am   Are u making a new vid?

     sounds boring. how about i make 100 vids, or more

4.5.20  11:05 am   why can't i go outside anymore?

     possibly due to covid 19, or the only other explanation i have is that someone may have built a giant house around your house, so that even when you think you went outside you are still inside

4.5.20  10:59 am   What do you think about covid-19?

     sneaky

4.5.20  10:51 am   Do you try to make your videos feel like an acid trip?

     no but that seems like a solid strategy. convenient for those who can't afford acid or have never heard of it

4.5.20  10:35 am   What is the best historic event that happened through the human history?

     cranial enlargement

4.5.20  10:22 am   can you guide me to the land of the two letter words kind sir

     sure

4.5.20  10:22 am   What is harmony?

     more than 1 note at a time

      And why does it feel so wonderful

     i blame love

4.5.20  10:16 am   Thoughts on stupid silly cereal?

     those are your thoughts on it, not mine. can't give my thoughts because you did not independently verify the identity of the cereal in any way outside the context of your own thoughts, for me to even know what cereal you are talking about

4.5.20  10:12 am   why is it so hard to identify the notes in a chord? at least for me.

     maybe it's because chords are overwhelmingly distracting, with their beauty

      cause when i tried to transcribe a chord from a song, i mistook it for a note. any tips on how to solve this?

     experience, and time. one day when you are older you will know everything. and you will wonder how you even learned it
